name: MessageReceiver
description: Plugin to receive messages from an external DSRC radio or other source

configuration.description: IP address for the incoming message network connection.
Port for the incoming message network connection.
Set the flag to route a received J2735 message over DSRC.
Accept and route incoming BSM messages from a V2I Hub simulator.
Accept and route incoming SRM messages from a V2I Hub simulator.
Accept and route incoming GPS location messages from a V2I Hub simulator.
Strategy for assignment of messages to new threads. RoundRobin, Random or ShortestQueue.
